availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Green H. McAtee (Mason County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Phoebe McAtee. Father of Ann M. McAtee, Benjamin F. McAtee, Jacob F. McAtee, Alfred McAtee, Lillie N. McAtee, William G. McAtee, and Martha W. McAtee. Farmer in Mason County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 153.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, p. 28.
Federal Mortality Census Schedules, 1850-1880, and Related Indexes, 1850-1880 NARA Microfilm Publication, T655, Roll 16, p. 959 (accessed via Ancestry.com)
